page.title: 10TRADE_SHOPS_
page.content: There are lots of shops in our D-block one of which is{Rockbottom.}It sells sweets,jewlery,toiletries, clothes and shoes.Another shop is{Mr.James's shop.He sells food,clothes and cleaning equipment.Next is the {Fruiterer's}it sells tinned food, cereals,fruit,crisps,vegetables and tobbaco.{The Video shop}sells sweets and you can rent video tapes and videos. Lots of people like to go to the{Fish and Chip shop}during the day and night.It also sells confectionery and soft drinks.There is a{Newsagents}which sells confectionery newspapers,comics,magazines,stationery equipment,cards,soft drinks. There is also a{Pet shop}it sells pets and pet food,a few toys,torches,plants and garden equipment.The{Post office}sells cards,stamps,gift tokens and you can get family benefit and pension money.
